latest news.eng_title: 10 must-see TV shows coming soon to Netflix, Amazon, Disney+, Apple TV+ and more

Media: The Lyle And Erik Menendez Story

latest news.summary: Several highly anticipated TV shows are set to release on popular streaming services before the end of 2024. These include 'Slow Horses', a spy thriller starring Gary Oldman, 'Agatha All Along', a Marvel series about Agatha Harkness, and 'The Penguin', a spin-off of 'The Batman' film. Other notable releases include 'The Lyle And Erik Menendez Story', a true-crime drama from Ryan Murphy, 'Disclaimer', a mystery series starring Cate Blanchett, and 'Rivals', a drama about business rivalry. Additionally, 'The Jackal', a remake of the 1973 film, and 'Dune: Prophecy', a spin-off of the 'Dune' franchise, are set to release. Other shows include 'Warhammer 40,000: The Animated Series', an adult-animated anthology series, and the second season of 'Squid Game', a surprise Netflix phenomenon. These shows promise to cater to a wide range of genres, including sci-fi, superheroes, horror, drama, and mystery.
latest news.title: 10 must-see TV shows coming soon to Netflix, Amazon, Disney+, Apple TV+ and more

latest news.eng_title: ‘The Boys' and ‘House of the Dragon' Excelled, But One Netflix Show Outshines Them Both
latest news.summary: The fourth season of 'The Boys' and the second season of 'House of the Dragon' both performed well in viewership numbers, but were outshined by a different Netflix show. According to Nielsen numbers, 'The Boys' Season 4 and 'House of the Dragon' Season 2 had impressive ratings, but did not claim the top spot. The article notes that the Netflix show 'emerged as the clear winner of the summer season,' but does not reveal which show it is, stating that it will be discussed in upcoming paragraphs.
latest news.title: ‘The Boys' and ‘House of the Dragon' Excelled, But One Netflix Show Outshines Them Both

latest news.eng_title: What Are The Must-See Shows For September 2024?

Person: Daryl Dixon: The Book Of Carol
Event: Fight Night: The Million Dollar Heist

latest news.summary: Several TV series are set to premiere in September 2024, offering a mix of genres and styles. Slow Horses: Season 4 will follow the story of MI5 agents handling matters of national importance, while Fight Night: The Million Dollar Heist will be a heist story based on a true event. The Perfect Couple, a Netflix series starring Nicole Kidman, will be a murder mystery set in a wealthy Nantucket family. Power Book II: Ghost will unfurl its final season, and Emily in Paris will return for its fourth part. The Old Man will see the return of Jeff Bridges as a former assassin, and The Penguin will follow Colin Farrell's character in the Gotham underworld. The Walking Dead: Daryl Dixon: The Book Of Carol will see the reunion of Norman Reedus and Melissa McBride's characters in a zombie apocalypse story.
latest news.title: What Are The Must-See Shows For September 2024?

latest news.eng_title: Emmy Awards coming up, with columnist Neal Zoren's predictions
latest news.summary: The Emmy Awards are approaching, with columnist Neal Zoren predicting the winners in various categories. Jeremy Allen White is expected to win Best Actor in a Comedy Series for his role as Chef Carmi in 'The Bear.' The show is also likely to win Best Comedy Series. Ayo Edibiri is predicted to win Best Actress in a Comedy Series, and Jamie Lee Curtis may take home the award for Best Supporting Actress in a Comedy. In the drama categories, 'The Crown' is a strong contender for Best Drama Series, with Dominic West and Gary Oldman also predicted to win in their respective categories. Jennifer Aniston and Reese Witherspoon from 'The Morning Show' may lose to Carrie Coon in 'The Gilded Age' for Best Actress in a Drama Series. The nominees for Best Supporting Actor in a Drama Series include Billy Crudup, Jon Hamm, and Jonathan Pryce, with Pryce being Zoren's predicted winner. In the limited series categories, 'Fargo' is a strong contender for Best Limited Series, with Juno Temple and Andrew Scott also predicted to win in their respective categories. Dakota Fanning is predicted to win Best Supporting Actress in a Limited Series, and Jonathan Bailey is predicted to win Best Supporting Actor in a Limited Series. The article also mentions the upcoming NFL game between the Eagles and the Green Bay Packers, which will be played in Brazil, and the diagnosis of breast cancer for Channel 29's Sue Serio.
latest news.title: Emmy Awards coming up, with columnist Neal Zoren's predictions

latest news.eng_title: Jeff Bezos and Lauren Sánchez's Favorite TV Shows
latest news.summary: Jeff Bezos and his wife, Lauren Sánchez, enjoy watching TV series in their free time. According to Sánchez, their favorite moment is when the house is quiet and they decide which series to watch together. They have different tastes in TV shows, but they both enjoyed watching 'Baby Reindeer' and 'Fallout', with the latter being produced by Amazon's Prime Video. Sánchez also mentioned that they recently finished watching 'Presunto inocente' and 'Severance', both of which are produced by Apple TV+. Sánchez divides her time between Los Angeles and Bezos' base in Miami, where the couple has moved from Seattle. Bezos announced his move to Miami to be closer to his parents and because he and Sánchez 'love Miami', although it's also likely that he will save millions in taxes.
latest news.title: Estas son las últimas series que Jeff Bezos ha visto con su mujer

latest news.eng_title: YouTube Shows Are Determined To Win Emmys, Sooner or Later
latest news.summary: YouTube is close to winning an Emmy, according to a Wall Street Journal report. Although no YouTube shows were nominated this year, the platform is planning a 'seed-planting year' to increase its chances. YouTube Chief Business Officer Mary Ellen Coe said, 'They do their own screenwriting, editing, production and it's really changing the face of what independent entertainment means.' The company has identified Emmy categories that creators may be eligible for next year, including Outstanding Talk Series and Outstanding Structured Reality Program. However, there are still challenges to elevating YouTube content to mainstream status, such as a highly segmented audience and brand safety concerns. Despite this, YouTube and its creators will continue to pursue mainstream validation and ad dollars.
latest news.title: YouTube Shows Are Determined To Win Emmys, Sooner or Later

latest news.eng_title: These Are Our 12 Top Picks Of The Shows And Films To Stream On Netflix In September 2024
latest news.summary: Netflix has announced a diverse range of new shows and films for September 2024, including a competitive eating showdown, a mystery drama starring Nicole Kidman, and a dystopian teen drama. Other highlights include the return of popular shows 'Selling Sunset' and 'Emily in Paris', as well as a documentary about comedian Jack Whitehall's journey to fatherhood. The slate also includes a Studio Ghibli classic, 'Grave of the Fireflies', and a true-crime anthology series about the Menendez brothers. Additionally, there are several other films and shows, including a one-off documentary about Will Ferrell and his friend Harper Steele, who recently came out as transgender.
latest news.title: These Are Our 12 Top Picks Of The Shows And Films To Stream On Netflix In September 2024

latest news.eng_title: Jeff Bezos, Lauren Sánchez look chic in black and white outfits on double date with Kris Jenner, Cory Gamble in LA
latest news.summary: Jeff Bezos and Lauren Sánchez went on a double date with Kris Jenner and Cory Gamble in Los Angeles. The couple, who became engaged in May 2023, looked stylish as they left the Giorgio Baldi restaurant in Santa Monica. Bezos wore an all-black ensemble, while Sánchez wore a white and black Ronny Kobo Candy dress. Jenner wore a pink plaid blazer and Gamble wore a loose-fitting black pants set. The couple has been on a romantic getaway, including a stop in Rome where they were photographed partaking in PDA in front of the Trevi fountain. Sánchez recently opened up about their relationship, revealing they both enjoy binge-watching TV shows together. 'My favorite time is when the house is calm and quiet and Jeff and I are deciding what show we're going to binge that night,' she said. 'We recently saw Baby Reindeer, which of course everyone saw. Fallout was also so good. We also just finished Presumed Innocent, which was incredible,' she continued. 'Oh, and we loved Severance.'
latest news.title: Jeff Bezos, Lauren Sánchez look chic in black and white outfits on double date with Kris Jenner, Cory Gamble in LA

latest news.eng_title: Kris Jenner & Corey Gamble Double Date with Jeff Bezos & Lauren Sanchez in Santa Monica!
latest news.summary: Kris Jenner and Corey Gamble had a double date with Jeff Bezos and fiancée Lauren Sanchez at Giorgio Baldi in Santa Monica. Lauren, who recently promoted her children's book, shared that her favorite time with Jeff is deciding what show to binge-watch together, but admitted it takes time to agree on a show. She mentioned they've recently watched 'Baby Reindeer', 'Fallout', 'Presumed Innocent', and 'Severance'. According to Lauren, 'My favorite time is when the house is calm and quiet and Jeff and I are deciding what show we're going to binge that night.'
latest news.title: Kris Jenner & Corey Gamble Double Date with Jeff Bezos & Lauren Sanchez in Santa Monica!

news knowledge.eng_title: Emmys 2024 Poll: What Should Win for Outstanding Limited or Anthology Series?
news knowledge.summary: The Emmy for Outstanding Limited or Anthology Series is up for grabs this year, with five contenders vying for the top prize. The field includes new seasons of established TV brands, such as FX's Fargo and HBO's True Detective: Night Country, as well as Netflix's Baby Reindeer and Ripley, and Apple TV+'s Lessons in Chemistry. Without the prohibitive favorite Shōgun in the mix, the competition is fierce, but any one of these series could walk off with the big prize. According to TVLine, 'Season 5 of FX's Fargo may have been its most acclaimed yet, with stars Juno Temple and Jon Hamm also nabbing Emmy nods, and it won this Emmy back in 2014 for Season 1.' The question remains, which one would you be happiest to see collect a trophy on Emmy night?
news knowledge.title: Emmys 2024 Poll: What Should Win for Outstanding Limited or Anthology Series?

news knowledge.eng_title: Here's Where You Can Stream the 2024 Emmy Nominations for Best Limited/Anthology Series
news knowledge.summary: The 2024 Emmy Awards are approaching, and the nominees for Outstanding Limited or Anthology Series have been announced. The five shows nominated are Baby Reindeer, Fargo, Lessons in Chemistry, Ripley, and True Detective: Night Country. These shows are available to stream on Netflix, Hulu, Apple TV+, and HBO Max. Baby Reindeer is a semi-autobiographical portrayal of creator and star Richard Gadd's own life experiences, while Fargo is a crime anthology series that has expanded the world of the Coen Brothers' 1996 classic. Lessons in Chemistry tells the story of a brilliant chemist in the 1950s, and Ripley is a modernized reimagining of The Talented Mr. Ripley. True Detective: Night Country is a crime anthology series that has garnered a generally positive response from the upcoming awards season.
news knowledge.title: Here's Where You Can Stream the 2024 Emmy Nominations for Best Limited/Anthology Series

news knowledge.eng_title: Emmy Awards 2024: Scots Richard Gadd and Jack Lowden shortlisted for Baby Reindeer and Slow Horses

Title: best writing
writer
actor
comedian
best supporting actor in a drama series

news knowledge.summary: Scottish comedian, actor, and writer Richard Gadd's Netflix show Baby Reindeer has been nominated for 11 Emmy Awards, including 'best limited or anthology series', 'best acting', and 'best writing'. Additionally, Scottish actor Jack Lowden has been shortlisted for 'best supporting actor in a drama series' for his role in spy series Slow Horses. The nominations are led by historical drama Shōgun and foodie comedy-drama The Bear, with 25 and 23 nods respectively.
news knowledge.title: Emmy Awards 2024: Scots Richard Gadd and Jack Lowden shortlisted for Baby Reindeer and Slow Horses

news knowledge.summary: The 2024 Primetime Emmy Awards have announced the nominees for the top TV shows and actors. The nominees include FX's historical drama 'Shogun', dark humor 'Bear Like Richard God', and Netflix's 'Baby Reindeer'. Eligible programs must have aired in the United States between June 1, 2023 and May 31, 2024. The winners will be announced at a live ceremony on September 15. The full list of nominees is below.
news knowledge.title: Emmy nominations 2024: The full list

news knowledge.eng_title: Emmy Nominations 2024: Netflix Shows The Crown, Baby Reindeer, Ripley, and More
news knowledge.summary: The Emmy nominations for 2024 have been announced, with several Netflix shows receiving recognition. Baby Reindeer, a comedy-drama, received 11 nominations, including Outstanding Limited Series. Richard Gadd was also nominated for his role in the show. Imelda Staunton and Dominic West received nominations for their roles in The Crown, which has won 21 Emmys since its debut in 2016. Other notable nominations include Sofía Vergara for her leading role in Griselda and Andrew Scott for his portrayal of Tom Ripley in Ripley.
news knowledge.title: Emmy Nominations 2024: Netflix Shows The Crown, Baby Reindeer, Ripley, and More

news knowledge.eng_title: 2024 Emmys: Richard Gadd's Netflix Smash Hit ‘Baby Reindeer' Earns 11 Nominations
news knowledge.summary: Richard Gadd's Netflix series 'Baby Reindeer' has received 11 Emmy nominations, including nods for best lead actor in a limited or anthology series or movie for Gadd, and best supporting actress nominations for Jessica Gunning and Nava Mau. Tom Goodman-Hill also earned a best supporting actor nomination.
news knowledge.title: 2024 Emmys: Richard Gadd's Netflix Smash Hit ‘Baby Reindeer' Earns 11 Nominations

news knowledge.eng_title: See the full 2024 Emmy nominations list
news knowledge.summary: The 76th annual Primetime Emmy Awards nominations were announced, with 'Shōgun', 'The Bear', 'Hacks', 'Only Murders in the Building', and 'Baby Reindeer' earning multiple major nods. 'The Bear' set a new record for the most nominations in a single year for a comedy series, with 23. The nominations were announced by actors Tony Hale and Sheryl Lee Ralph. The Emmy Awards will be broadcast live on September 15. The article lists the nominees in the top categories, including Outstanding drama series, Outstanding comedy series, Outstanding limited or anthology series, and more.
news knowledge.title: See the full 2024 Emmy nominations list

news knowledge.eng_title: Emmy Awards nominations 2024: A list of the shows that made the cut
news knowledge.summary: The nominations for the 76th Annual Primetime Emmy Awards were announced on Wednesday morning. The nominees were revealed by Emmy-winning actors Sheryl Lee Ralph and Tony Hale at a live press event from Disney's El Capitan Theatre in Hollywood. The nominees included The Daily Show, Jimmy Kimmel Live, Late Night With Seth Meyers, and The Late Show with Stephen Colbert for Outstanding Talk Series. For Outstanding Lead Actress in a Limited Anthology Series or Movie, the nominees were Jodie Foster, Brie Larson, Juno Temple, Sofia Vergara, and Naomi Watts. The shows Baby Reindeer, Fargo, Lessons In Chemistry, Ripley, and True Detective were nominated for Outstanding Limited Anthology Series or Movie. The Emmy Awards will air live on ABC on Sunday, September 15, from the Peacock Theater in Los Angeles, with a host yet to be named.
news knowledge.title: Emmy Awards nominations 2024: A list of the shows that made the cut

news knowledge.eng_title: 2024 Limited Series Writing Emmy predictions: 'Baby Reindeer' and 'Fargo' are major contenders

Media: A Murder at the End of the World

news knowledge.summary: The 2024 Emmy Awards' Best Limited Series/TV Movie Writing category has 89 submissions, with 22 fewer than last year. The category has seen a mix of television movies and limited/anthology series, with some shows submitting only one episode for consideration. Top contenders include 'Baby Reindeer', 'Fargo', 'Ripley', 'True Detective: Night Country', 'The Sympathizer', 'Lessons in Chemistry', 'Fellow Travelers', 'Black Mirror', 'Masters of the Air', 'Feud: Capote vs. The Swans', 'A Murder at the End of the World', 'Expats', and 'Under the Bridge'. The category is tough to predict, with many established names behind the shows and a mix of anthology series and television movies. The nominations will be announced on July 17.
news knowledge.title: 2024 Limited Series Writing Emmy predictions: 'Baby Reindeer' and 'Fargo' are major contenders

news knowledge.eng_title: Editors Emmy nomination predictions slugfest: Debating whether 'Baby Reindeer' will prove to be the 'Beef' of 2024 in limited series [WATCH]
news knowledge.summary: Gold Derby editors debated the Emmy nominations for limited series and acting categories. They agreed that 'Baby Reindeer' is a strong contender for Best Limited Series, but disagreed on the rest of the category. They also discussed the acting categories, with some predicting Jessica Lange to win Best Limited Actress for her performance in 'The Great Lillian Hall'. In the Best Limited Actor race, Jon Hamm and Richard Gadd are seen as the top contenders, with Andrew Scott and Matt Bomer also receiving mentions. The editors emphasized the depth and quality of the competition in both categories.
news knowledge.title: Editors Emmy nomination predictions slugfest: Debating whether 'Baby Reindeer' will prove to be the 'Beef' of 2024 in limited series [WATCH]
